entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
